item.title: Python Basic
item.description: Python Basic # Argument # sys.argv # sample.py import sys args = sys.argv print(args) print(args[1]) print(args[2]) Run $ python simple.py aaa 123 ['sample.py', 'aaa', '123'] aaa argparse # Simple sample # sample.py import argparse description = 'A description of this program.' parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description=description) parser.add_argument('foo', type=str, help='First argument.') parser.add_argument('bar', type=int, help='Second argument.') args = parser.parse_args() print(args) print(args.foo) print(args.bar) Run $ python sample.py aaa 123 Namespace(foo='aaa', bar=123) aaa 123 Check help using -h or ---help
